items.title: Trump tariffs that are voided by — and ones that are safe from — Friday's appeals court ruling
items.description: If the Supreme Court upholds the ruling, President Donald Trump would lose some, but not all, of his broad tariff powers.

items.title: Trump is cutting 500-plus jobs at Voice of America and its parent agency despite legal challenges
items.description: The agency that oversees Voice of America is eliminating jobs for more than 500 employees, a Trump administration official said.

items.title: Most Trump tariffs ruled illegal by appeals court, dealing major blow to trade policy
items.description: The appeals court stayed its ruling until Oct. 14, giving the Trump administration time to ask the Supreme Court to hear the case.

items.title: Federal judge issues order blocking Trump effort to expand speedy deportations of migrants

items.title: Fate of Fed Gov. Lisa Cook still up in the air after court hearing on Trump firing bid
